title: Managing Your Money: How to Invest During a Bear Market
description: Peter Lazaroff, chief investment officer at Plancorp, which manages over $5.5 billion of client assets, speaks with Barron's senior writer Lauren Foster about ways to protect your portfolio during a bear market.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Peter Lazaroff, chief investment officer at Plancorp, which manages over $5.5 billion of client assets, speaks with Barron's senior writer Lauren Foster about ways to protect your portfolio during a bear market.
